Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 204-3 Filed 04/16/21 Page 343 of 348

By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.

R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY

Dated: 10/30/07
By: Jeffrey H. Sloman FAUSA
A. MARIE VILLAFANA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY

LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN

DOJ-OGR-00003519

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to the case of Jeffrey Epstein. It includes signatures and dates from various parties involved, including attorneys and Epstein himself. The document is part of a larger docket, as indicated by the page number (343 of 348).
